information.desc: Iâ€™m a studying web developer with a passion for programming. I love both front end and back-end so that makes me a fullstack developer. I have written code for years and love solving problems and learning new things every day!

basics.basics_desc: Document structure, such as document type, HTML, headings, links, images and paragraphs.
basics.basics_exp: Knows all of them without looking them up.

elements.elements_desc: Nested HTML elements, body, h1, p tags.
elements.elements_exp: Knows all of them without looking them up.

attributes.attributes_desc: Attributes of HTML tags, such as src, width, height and href, etc.
attributes.attributes_exp: Knows all of them without looking them up.

headings.headings_desc: The different sizes for h1-h6 tags. Importance in SEO perspective.
headings.headings_exp: Knows all of them without looking them up.

paragraphs.paragraphs_desc: How to write and format Paragraphs and how the browser read them.
paragraphs.paragraphs_exp: Knows all of them without looking them up.

styles.styles_desc: How to style HTML elements with CSS.
styles.styles_exp: Knows all of them without looking them up.

formatting.formatting_desc: Format text to give it a special meaning. Example of this is Bold and Italic.
formatting.formatting_exp: Knows most of them without looking it up.
